changelog:
## BurgTV v1.0.97

### Bug Fixes
- Fix: Profiles 'Show on Start' now shows toggle instead of arrow
- Fix: EPG/Remote selection dialogs show checkmark instead of X artifact
- Fix: About BurgTV scroll/focus - no more jump to bottom on open
- Fix: About BurgTV shows actual logo instead of placeholder
- Fix: Licenses dialog now includes Apache License URL
- Fix: Channel switch no longer exits with premature timeout (playerErrorRetryCount reset)
- Fix: Storage Backup/Restore buttons now show 'Coming Soon' instead of fake success
- Fix: 'Channel locked/unlocked' toast translated in all 14 languages

### Improvements
- Clock displayed in live TV fullscreen player overlay (top-right)
- Category name displayed in live TV fullscreen overlay (top-left)
- Top gradient bar in live TV overlay for better readability
- Clock displayed in film/series player overlay (top-left)
- All new strings translated in 14 languages
